items.badge_description: What happens when you take two or more amazing breweries, throw them into the tank and let them ferment together? An amazing collaboration beer, that’s what! Cheers to working together to create the perfect flavor. That's 5 different beers that been brewed as a collaboration. Try 5 more for Level 2!
